author: The Film Theorists
description:

*🧬 Subscribe to create your own Stitch!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

Stitch from Lilo and Stitch is a MONSTER – well…he’s a genetic experiment pieced together from the DNA of various alien species from across the galaxy. But that got me thinking… what if I wanted to create MY OWN Stitch? That’s what I’m going to be doing in today’s episode!

title: Film Theory: Stitch is NOT an Alien?!
